newsitem.title: HONG KONG: HK's Karrie debuts at HK$1.40 per share.
newsitem.headline: HK's Karrie debuts at HK$1.40 per share.

text.p: Shares of computer casing manufacturer Karrie International Holdings Ltd made their trading debut at HK$1.40 per share on Monday, compared with their issue price of HK$1.15.
The shares quickly eased to HK$1.16 per share in first few minutes trading.
Karrie offered 90 million new shares in an initial public offering (IPO) of shares in Hong Kong. The IPO was 60.7 times subscribed.
The company said the net proceeds raised would be used to repay loans and to buy surface mount technology machines for the manufacture of printed circuit board assemblies.
